participant_1.background:
I just graduated from college two years ago.
I am a kindergarten teacher.
I can barely pay my bills every month.
I share an apartment in seattle with two roommates.
I have one cat.

participant_2.background:
I love playing frisbee.
I never finished high school.
I have two large dogs.
I eat sardines for breakfast daily.

content.text: Good, good. Just got back from playing frisbee with my dogs. How about you?
Not bad. I'm just getting ready to go to work. I'm a kindergarten teacher.
That's cool. I never finished high school, but I'm pretty smart.
I'm sure you are. What do you do for a living?
I work in a pet store. I like it because I get to play with animals all day.
That sounds like a fun job. I love animals. I have a cat named Mittens.
I have two dogs named Bailey and Buddy. They're both golden retrievers.
Golden retrievers are so cute! I love their fluffy coats.
Yeah, they're great dogs. They're always happy and they love to play.
Sounds like you have a great life.
I do. I have a good job, I have a nice home, and I have two great dogs. I can't complain.
I'm glad to hear that. I'm just starting out my career, so I'm still trying to figure everything out.
It takes time to find your way. Just keep working hard and you'll eventually find success.
Thanks for the advice. I appreciate it.
No problem. Have a good day at work!
